ellipse.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 0px; paint-order: fill; fill: url(#gradient-0); fill-rule: nonzero;

path.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); paint-order: fill; fill-rule: nonzero; fill: none; stroke-width: 0px;

text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 'GT-Flexa'; font-size: 124px; white-space: pre;

path.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); paint-order: fill; fill-rule: nonzero; fill: none; stroke-width: 0px;

text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: 'GT-Flexa'; font-size: 124px; white-space: pre;
